name: jwwlib-wasm
description: WebAssembly library for reading JWW (JW_CAD) files in the browser

scripts.build: pnpm run build:wasm && pnpm run build:js
scripts.build:wasm: pnpm run build:wasm:debug && pnpm run build:wasm:release
scripts.build:wasm:debug: mkdir -p build && cd build && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug .. && emmake make
scripts.build:wasm:release: mkdir -p build-release && cd build-release && emcmake cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && emmake make

author: jwwlib-wasm contributors
